descriptions:
['DescriptionExperience the ultimate urban lifestyle within a stunning beachside paradise. Creek Beach offers family-friendly seaside retreats designed to give all the tropical pleasures of a resort-style address. Boasting direct private access to a 300- metre stretch of pristine beach, swimming pools & a host of luxurious amenities, everything you need to for a restful, relaxing escape is right at your doorstep.
Ideally situated, the location of Creek Beach apartments provides the best waterfront living experience w/ its close proximity to the scenic marina, sandy beaches, seaside restaurants & shopping venues. Boasting its very own metro station, residents at Creek Beach have adequate access to public transportation, bringing an entirely new level of convenience and comfort. This residential haven is tucked away to provide serene living experience.

descriptions:
['DescriptionLa Rosa by Dubai Holdings is a plush residential project located at Villanova in Dubai. Dubai Holdings is a
reputed realty company in Dubai. These exceptionally beautiful villas are located in a serene area which is
close to the city and it is just the mirror image of the beautiful Mediterranean lifestyle. It is just like a small
town within a city. A lovely place to be at.
What are the key Details of the project?
You can opt for either 3 bedroom or 4 bedroom villas as a wide variety is available to choose from. The villas
are well-equipped with world-class modern specifications to make you fall head over heels in love with these
alluring houses.
What are the amenities available here?
The range of amenities will surprise you as you will get almost everything modern and chic. The gated
community provides security always. Lovely parks with perfect jogging tracks. A shopping centre to suffice
your daily household needs. A huge play area for children, help them grow better, let them play. A community
swimming pool where you can enjoy your leisure time. Well-equipped gymnasium to keep you in great shape.
Beautifully landscaped gardens with paved compounds and car parking areas.
Advantage of the location
Location wise this place earns an extra brownie point because it is strategically located in near the junction of
Emirates Road and Al Ain road. It takes 7 minutes to reach the Global village from this place. Within 15
minutes you will reach Dubai airport, just 18 minutes to Business Bay. It takes just 15 minutes to Down Town
Dubai. This place is also close to well-known schools, colleges, hospitals, recreational areas, etc.
USPs of the project:
Community swimming pool.
Gymnasium.
Parks landscaped gardens and paved compounds..
Car parking areas.
Play area for children.
Townhouse Size – 2333 Sq Ft.
Townhouse Price –1617900 AED.
For more details, feel free to call us the earliest.']

["DescriptionThis gorgeous 3 bedroom apartment which comes with 4 bathrooms and a maid's room is located in the beautiful Serenia Residences. The apartment has a stunning views overlooking the beach.
Serenia is an exclusive gated beachfront residence, located on a unique beachfront plot on the exclusive crescent of The Palm Jumeirah. Nestled between the luxurious Waldorf Astoria and the Anantara Resort & Spa; Serenia residents will be spoilt for choice among the neighboring fine dining restaurants and world-class spas.
FEATURES:
- 2,885 Sqft Built Up Area
- Beachfront
- All Ensuite bedrooms
- Large balcony
- Floor to ceiling windows
- Modern Design
- Maid's Room
Serenia offers you a pure connection to nature and relaxed bliss with its sophisticated architecture, where floor to ceiling glass blur the boundaries between outdoors and indoors, providing panoramic views stretching across The Palm towards Atlantis, Burj Al Arab, the Dubai Marina skyline and the captivating blue seas of The Gulf.
Serenia ensures that your world becomes beachfront living at its finest."]
